meanings.type: Suru verb - special class, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to touch; to come in contact with; to border on; to adjoin; to be adjacent; to be close このような接し方の変化は、他の変化もそうであるが、他の国においても起こっている。Like other changes, this change in attitude has occurred in other countries, too.

meanings.type: Suru verb - special class, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to receive (e.g. visitor); to attend to; to serve; to take care of; to look after; to act towards; to deal with; to see もっと思いやりをもって接してやらないといけませんよ。You must treat them with more consideration.

meanings.type: Suru verb - special class, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to receive (news); to get; to hear

meanings.type: Suru verb - special class, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to encounter; to come across

meanings.type: Suru verb - special class, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to be tangent to Mathematics

meanings.type: Suru verb - special class, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to make touch; to bring into contact with; to bring adjacent to; to bring close; to connect

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'gu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to join; to piece together; to set (bones) 医者は彼の折れた足をついだ。The doctor set his broken leg.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'gu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to graft (onto a tree) 枝が伸び、実が成ることを想定して接ぐ場所を選びましょう。Select the graft point after imagining how the branches will extend and fruit grow.

meanings.meaning: 1. point of tangency; point of contact Mathematics

2. (electrical) contact あたりまえだが、人と人との接点は「ことば」である。その言葉によって、考えを共有し、議論している。It's obvious but the connection between people is "words". It is by those words that thoughts are shared and arguments carried out.
3. point of contact (between); connection; point of agreement; common ground
切点 【せってん】
切点: Rarely-used kanji form.

sentences.translation: It's obvious but the connection between people is "words". It is by those words that thoughts are shared and arguments carried out.
